product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Shoe size
product.description: Used to define the size of footwear, e.g. Extra large (XL), 9.5

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Jewelry material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in jewelry items, such as gold or enamel

product.name: Jewelry type
product.description: Distinguishes between types of jewelry, such as fine or imitation jewelry

product.name: Product rating
product.description: Average rating from customers

product.name: Product rating count
product.description: Total number of ratings from customers

product.name: Outerwear clothing features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of outerwear, like insulated or waterproof

product.name: Clothing features
product.description: Describes unique properties of apparel, such as water resistant or wrinkle resistant

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Band color
product.description: Specifies the color of a watch band, e.g. multicolor, rose gold

product.name: Scent
product.description: Specifies the fragrance or aroma of a product, such as vanilla or citrus

product.name: Food bag material
product.description: Identifies the material used in food storage bags, such as paper or silicone

product.name: Footwear material
product.description: Specifies the type of material used in footwear, such as suede or rubber

product.description: Provides guidance for product upkeep, such as hand wash or dry clean only

product.description: Identifies special characteristics of shoes, such as waterproof or lightweight

product.name: Bedding size
product.description: Defines the size category for bedding items, e.g. standard, king

product.description: Identifies the main material used in a tool or utensil, like stainless steel or teak wood

product.name: Bag/Case closure
product.description: Identifies the type of closure used on bags or cases, e.g. key lock, velcro

product.name: Material

product.name: Cover material
